3 namespace Ubiquity\utils\base;
4 
14 class UDateTime {
15  const MYSQL_DATETIME_FORMAT = 'Y-m-d H:i:s';
16  const MYSQL_DATE_FORMAT = 'Y-m-d';
17  private static $locales = [ "fr" => [ "fr","fr_FR","fr_FR.UTF-8" ],"en" => [ "en","en_US","en_US.UTF-8" ] ];
18 
19  private static function setLocale($locale) {
20  if (isset ( self::$locales [$locale] )) {
21  $locale = self::$locales [$locale];
22  } else {
23  $locale = self::$locales ["en"];
24  }
25  setlocale ( LC_TIME, $locale [0], $locale [1], $locale [2] );
26  }
27 
28  public static function secondsToTime($seconds) {
29  $hours = floor ( $seconds / 3600 );
30  $mins = floor ( $seconds / 60 % 60 );
31  $secs = floor ( $seconds % 60 );
32  return sprintf ( '%02d:%02d:%02d', $hours, $mins, $secs );
33  }
34 
35  public static function mysqlDate(\DateTime $date) {
36  return $date->format ( self::MYSQL_DATE_FORMAT );
37  }
38 
39  public static function mysqlDateTime(\DateTime $datetime) {
40  return $datetime->format ( self::MYSQL_DATETIME_FORMAT );
41  }
42 
43  public static function longDate($date, $locale = "en") {
44  self::setLocale ( $locale );
45  return utf8_encode ( strftime ( "%A %d %B %Y", strtotime ( $date ) ) );
46  }
47 
48  public static function shortDate($date, $locale = "en") {
49  self::setLocale ( $locale );
50  return strftime ( "%x", strtotime ( $date ) );
51  }
52 
53  public static function shortDatetime($datetime, $locale = "en") {
54  self::setLocale ( $locale );
55  return strftime ( "%c", strtotime ( $datetime ) );
56  }
57 
58  public static function longDatetime($datetime, $locale = "en") {
59  self::setLocale ( $locale );
60  return utf8_encode ( strftime ( "%A %d %B %Y, %T", strtotime ( $datetime ) ) );
61  }
62 
70  public static function elapsed($datetime, $full = false) {
71  $now = new \DateTime ();
72  $ago = new \DateTime ( $datetime );
73  $diff = $now->diff ( $ago );
74 
75  $diff->w = floor ( $diff->d / 7 );
76  $diff->d -= $diff->w * 7;
77 
78  $string = array ('y' => 'year','m' => 'month','w' => 'week','d' => 'day','h' => 'hour','i' => 'minute','s' => 'second' );
79  foreach ( $string as $k => &$v ) {
80  if ($diff->$k) {
81  $v = $diff->$k . ' ' . $v . ($diff->$k > 1 ? 's' : '');
82  } else {
83  unset ( $string [$k] );
84  }
85  }
86 
87  if (! $full)
88  $string = array_slice ( $string, 0, 1 );
89  return $string ? implode ( ', ', $string ) . ' ago' : 'just now';
90  }
91 }
